title.narrative: F.a: Establishment of communication strategy and its initial implementation for a better visibility of DP Hanoi

description.narrative: Capacity building related to communication of Vietnam's biggest disability organisation, DP Hanoi and its 54 organizational members, in order to execute DP Hanoi?s development strategy and to implement its communication work in a more professional manner. DP Hanoi?s image and reputation will be improved and thus the implementation of the law on disability and CRPD will be promoted. The project will build capacity of leaders of DP Hanoi and its organizational members in terms of strategy communication. This project will also contribute to the policy advocacy for accessibility of information and communication for PWDs in particular and other issues in general. The attitudes towards disability will become more positive and thus the inclusion of persons with dis ability into society will be increased.
